content:
## MLE-70-SKAT
You can create a taxcard by using Decentralized recording, but subscription for e-taxcard has to be¬†requested with record MLE-65-GREK.
The following fields are key fields:¬†KUNDEFORHOLD (CUSTOMER ID), ARBEJDSGIVER (EMPLOYER), IDENTIFIKATION (IDENTIFICATION),¬†MEDARBEJDER (EMPLOYEE), SKATTEKORTTYPE (TAX CARD TYPE), TRAEKPROCENT (TAX¬†PERCENTAGE), STARTDATO (START DATE) and SLUTDATO (END DATE)
üë©‚Äçüè´ Case
18;1;MLE-70-SKAT;1;H;4753;;40;01082017;31122017;3
